text: {| class="infobox" style="width: 20em; font-size:90%;" |- | colspan="4" style="text-align: center; font-size: 150%;" | Ocean State Cup |- |valign="top"|Teams: |colspan="4"|Brown Bears Bryant Bulldogs Providence Friars Rhode Island Rams |- |Originated: |colspan="4"|2009 |- |valign="top"|Trophy Series: |colspan="3"|Brown leads with 5 |- |Current Holder: | colspan="3" | |- |colspan="4" style="border-bottom: 1px solid #aaa;"| * * * |- | style="text-align:center; width:13em;"| | style="text-align:center; width:13em;"| | style="text-align:center; width:13em;"| | style="text- align:center; width:25em;"| |- style="vertical-align:top;" | style="text- align:center; width:25%;"|Bears 2009-10 2010-11 2013-14 2014-15 2016-17 | style="text-align:center; width:25%;"|Bulldogs 2011-12 2012-13 2015-16 | style="text-align:center; width:25%;"|Friars 2017-18 | style="text-align:center; width:25%;"|Rams |- |colspan="4" style="text-align: center; border-top: 1px solid #aaa;"| Shared Awards (0) |} The Ocean State Cup is awarded to each season's winner of the quadrangular all sports series among the four Rhode Island Division I schools, the Brown Bears, Bryant Bulldogs, Providence Friars, and Rhode Island Rams. In the event of a tie, the award is shared, but the previous winner retains possession of the trophy. ==History of the Cup== The Ocean State Cup was created in 2009 when Bryant declared its move to Division I. The Ocean State Cup started off as just a lacrosse cup and was between Brown, Bryant and Providence. In 2011, the cup was moved to an all-sports cup and now included Rhode Island. ==Winners of the trophy== Brown victories are shown in ██ brown, Bryant victories in ██ Gold, Providence victories in ██ black, and Rhode Island victories in ██ Keaney Blue. Future events are shown in ██ silver. In the event of a shared award, the previous year's winner retains custody of the trophy. Below are the winners of the Ocean State Cup for Men's Lacrosse. {|%" |- ! style="width:5%;"| Season ! style="width:15%;"| Ocean State Cup Winner |- !2009–10 |style="background: #5C3317; color: red; text-align:center;" | Brown |- !2010–11 |style="background: #5C3317; color: red; text-align:center;" | Brown |- !2011–12 |style="background: #BDB76B; color: black; text- align:center;" | Bryant |- !2012–13 |style="background: #BDB76B; color: black; text-align:center;" | Bryant |- !2013–14 |style="background: #5C3317; color: red; text-align:center;" | Brown |- !2014–15 |style="background: #5C3317; color: red; text-align:center;" | Brown |- !2015–16 |style="background: #BDB76B; color: black; text-align:center;" | Bryant |- !2016–17 |style="background: #5C3317; color: red; text-align:center;" | Brown |- !2017–18 |style="background: #000000; color: white; text-align:center;" | Providence |- |} ==References== Category:College football rivalry trophies in the United States Category:Rhode Island Rams Category:Brown Bears Category:Bryant Bulldogs Category:Providence Friars
title: Ocean State Cup
